name: VOW2Code
summary: VOW2Code converts the Vocabulary of Web Ontologies to Code.
short_description: VOW2Code (Vocabulary of Web Ontologies to Code) is a free, open source code generation tool that can be used to convert the vocabulary of OWL ontologies to Java code. The result is a Java class in which the terms of the vocabulary are translated into constants based on a series of options (that may take semantics into account). Thus, VOW2Code is highly configurable, supporting many command line options.
